meanings.definition: The act of discontinuing or ceasing something.
meanings.sent1: The discontinuations of the old bus routes caused confusion.
meanings.sent2: The discontinuations of certain products led to protests from customers.
meanings.sent3: The sudden discontinuations of the daily coffee breaks left the office workers in shock.
meanings.sent4: Her abrupt discontinuations of conversations made her seem mysterious.
meanings.sent5: The discontinuations of the train service were announced with loudspeaker announcements.

meanings.definition: The state of being discontinued or stopped.
meanings.sent1: The discontinuations of the project left everyone wondering what went wrong.
meanings.sent2: The discontinuations of flights due to bad weather caused delays for travelers.
meanings.sent3: The discontinuations of the music abruptly made the party feel awkward.
meanings.sent4: The discontinuations of the river flow in summer created a serene atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The sudden discontinuations of the internet service frustrated many users.
